markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Ogre Warrior](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3118)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The simplest of ogres are slabs of muscle with hateful eyes, misshapen visages, and malformed bodies. Always eager for mayhem and murder, ogre warriors are quick to turn on their kin when there's a shortage of smaller folk to torment, so those who lead ogres do their best to keep them constantly distracted with new opportunities for raids and ruin.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Ogre_Warrior.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Ogre Warrior](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3118)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Giant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=616" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 250 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +5; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** -1

**Con** +4

**Int** -2

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Items**
[Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), [javelins](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (6), [Ogre Hook](/Weapons.aspx?ID=86)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +5 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 50

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
ogre hook +12 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d10+7 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +6 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 piercing

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-451" />
name: Ogre Warrior
